original_title: Sri Lanka wins silver in 4x400m women’s relay
original_body_lines: The Women’s 4x400m Silver medal was won by Tharushi Karunarathna, Nadeesha Ramanayake, Sayuri Lakshima, and Nishendra Fernando.
They clocked a time of 3:33.27, a Sri Lanka record. Vietnam won first place, while India finished third. (Susil Premalal)
